languages.text: {n}Мужчина приглядывается к вам.{/n} "И не просто кто-то, а сам{mf||а} {mf|Лорд|Леди} фон Валанциус! У вас древний и славный род, Ваша Светлость. В секторе Скарус сохранилось несколько чудесных сооружений — и оборонительного, и декоративного характера — построенных по приказу ваших предков. Они хранят память о династии, несмотря на то, что та давно сосредоточила деятельность в ином секторе".

{n}He takes a closer look at you.{/n} "Not just someone — it's {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}! Yours is an ancient and glorious line, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A number of magnificent structures built on your ancestors' orders — both for defensive and decorative purposes — remain in the Scarus Sector. They keep your dynasty's memory alive despite the fact that it has long since focused its endeavours in a different sector."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина приглядывается к вам.{/n} "И не просто кто-то, а сам{mf||а} {mf|Лорд|Леди} фон Валанциус! У вас древний и славный род, Ваша Светлость. В секторе Скарус сохранилось несколько чудесных сооружений — и оборонительного, и декоративного характера — построенных по приказу ваших предков. Они хранят память о династии, несмотря на то, что та давно сосредоточила деятельность в ином секторе".

A number of magnificent structures built on your ancestors' orders — both for defensive and decorative purposes — remain in the Scarus Sector. They keep your dynasty's memory alive despite the fact that it has long since focused its endeavours in a different sector."

languages.text: {n}彼がじっくりをこちらを見てきた。{/n}「誰かと思ったら…フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下ではありませんか！あなたは代々続く立派な血筋をお持ちです、陛下。スカルス星域にはあなたの先祖の命令で建設された、防御と装飾の両方を目的とする壮麗な建造物が数多く残っています。あなたの王朝は長い間、別の星域に力を注いできたにもかかわらず、その建造物のおかげで当時の記憶が守られ続けています」
languages.original_text: {n}He takes a closer look at you.{/n} "Not just someone — it's {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}! Yours is an ancient and glorious line, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A number of magnificent structures built on your ancestors' orders — both for defensive and decorative purposes — remain in the Scarus Sector. They keep your dynasty's memory alive despite the fact that it has long since focused its endeavours in a different sector."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼がじっくりをこちらを見てきた。{/n}「誰かと思ったら…フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下ではありませんか！あなたは代々続く立派な血筋をお持ちです、陛下。スカルス星域にはあなたの先祖の命令で建設された、防御と装飾の両方を目的とする壮麗な建造物が数多く残っています。あなたの王朝は長い間、別の星域に力を注いできたにもかかわらず、その建造物のおかげで当時の記憶が守られ続けています」

languages.text: {n}他仔细地打量着你。{/n}“您可不是什么普通人，而是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝领主本人！您的家族古老而光荣，您的祖先下令建造了许多宏伟建筑，有的建筑出于防御目的，还有的则出于装饰目的。这些建筑目前依然留在斯卡乌斯星区。尽管您的王朝早就把精力放在在了另一个截然不同的领域，但那些建筑依然为您的王朝留下了鲜活的记忆。”
languages.original_text: {n}He takes a closer look at you.{/n} "Not just someone — it's {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}! Yours is an ancient and glorious line, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A number of magnificent structures built on your ancestors' orders — both for defensive and decorative purposes — remain in the Scarus Sector. They keep your dynasty's memory alive despite the fact that it has long since focused its endeavours in a different sector."

traits.locale_text: {n}他仔细地打量着你。{/n}“您可不是什么普通人，而是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝领主本人！您的家族古老而光荣，您的祖先下令建造了许多宏伟建筑，有的建筑出于防御目的，还有的则出于装饰目的。这些建筑目前依然留在斯卡乌斯星区。尽管您的王朝早就把精力放在在了另一个截然不同的领域，但那些建筑依然为您的王朝留下了鲜活的记忆。”

languages.text: {n}Se acerca más a ti para inspeccionarte.{/n} «Y no alguien cualquiera, ¡sino {mf|el mismísimo lord|la mismísima lady} von Valancius! La suya es una estirpe vetusta y gloriosa, {mf|milord|milady}. Sus ancestros mandaron construir una serie de estructuras apabullantes, con fines tanto defensivos como decorativos, que siguen aún en pie en el sector Scarus. Mantienen presente el recuerdo de su dinastía, pese a que hace mucho que centra sus esfuerzos en otro sector».
languages.original_text: {n}He takes a closer look at you.{/n} "Not just someone — it's {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}! Yours is an ancient and glorious line, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A number of magnificent structures built on your ancestors' orders — both for defensive and decorative purposes — remain in the Scarus Sector. They keep your dynasty's memory alive despite the fact that it has long since focused its endeavours in a different sector."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se acerca más a ti para inspeccionarte.{/n} «Y no alguien cualquiera, ¡sino {mf|el mismísimo lord|la mismísima lady} von Valancius! La suya es una estirpe vetusta y gloriosa, {mf|milord|milady}. Sus ancestros mandaron construir una serie de estructuras apabullantes, con fines tanto defensivos como decorativos, que siguen aún en pie en el sector Scarus. Mantienen presente el recuerdo de su dinastía, pese a que hace mucho que centra sus esfuerzos en otro sector».

languages.text: {n}Il vous regarde plus attentivement.{/n} « Et pas n'importe qui, mais {mf|le seigneur|dame} von Valancius en personne ! Votre lignée est aussi ancienne que prestigieuse, Votre Seigneurie. Le secteur Scarus compte encore un grand nombre des majestueuses structures érigées sur ordre de vos ancêtres à des fins tant défensives que décoratives. Elles perpétuent le souvenir de votre dynastie, même si cette dernière a délaissé ce secteur il y a longtemps pour concentrer ses activités sur un autre. »
languages.original_text: {n}He takes a closer look at you.{/n} "Not just someone — it's {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}! Yours is an ancient and glorious line, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A number of magnificent structures built on your ancestors' orders — both for defensive and decorative purposes — remain in the Scarus Sector. They keep your dynasty's memory alive despite the fact that it has long since focused its endeavours in a different sector."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous regarde plus attentivement.{/n} « Et pas n'importe qui, mais {mf|le seigneur|dame} von Valancius en personne ! Votre lignée est aussi ancienne que prestigieuse, Votre Seigneurie. Le secteur Scarus compte encore un grand nombre des majestueuses structures érigées sur ordre de vos ancêtres à des fins tant défensives que décoratives. Elles perpétuent le souvenir de votre dynastie, même si cette dernière a délaissé ce secteur il y a longtemps pour concentrer ses activités sur un autre. »

languages.text: {n}Er betrachtet dich genauer.{/n} "Nicht nur irgendjemand – es ist {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius persönlich! Eure Linie ist alteingesessen und ruhmreich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Zahlreiche prächtige Bauwerke wurden auf Befehl Eurer Vorfahren errichtet – sowohl zur Verteidigung als auch zur Dekoration – und zieren noch heute den Scarus-Sektor. Sie halten die Erinnerung an Eure Dynastie am Leben, obwohl sie sich längst auf andere Geschäftsinteressen verlegt hat."
languages.original_text: {n}He takes a closer look at you.{/n} "Not just someone — it's {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}! Yours is an ancient and glorious line, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A number of magnificent structures built on your ancestors' orders — both for defensive and decorative purposes — remain in the Scarus Sector. They keep your dynasty's memory alive despite the fact that it has long since focused its endeavours in a different sector."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er betrachtet dich genauer.{/n} "Nicht nur irgendjemand – es ist {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius persönlich! Eure Linie ist alteingesessen und ruhmreich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Zahlreiche prächtige Bauwerke wurden auf Befehl Eurer Vorfahren errichtet – sowohl zur Verteidigung als auch zur Dekoration – und zieren noch heute den Scarus-Sektor. Sie halten die Erinnerung an Eure Dynastie am Leben, obwohl sie sich längst auf andere Geschäftsinteressen verlegt hat."

languages.text: {n}Sana daha yakından bakıyor.{/n} "Öyle sıradan birisi de değil... {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius Hazretleri! Kadim ve şanlı bir soydansınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Atalarınızın emri üzerine hem savunma amacı hem de dekoratif amaçlarla Scarus Sektöründe inşa edilen pek çok görkemli yapı, hâlâ ayakta durur. Çoktandır başka sektörlere odaklanmış olsanız da bu yapılar, hanedanlığınızın anısını canlı tutuyor."
languages.original_text: {n}He takes a closer look at you.{/n} "Not just someone — it's {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius {mf|himself|herself}! Yours is an ancient and glorious line, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A number of magnificent structures built on your ancestors' orders — both for defensive and decorative purposes — remain in the Scarus Sector. They keep your dynasty's memory alive despite the fact that it has long since focused its endeavours in a different sector."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana daha yakından bakıyor.{/n} "Öyle sıradan birisi de değil... {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius Hazretleri bu! Kadim ve şanlı bir soydansınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Atalarınızın emriyle hem savunma amacıyla hem de dekoratif amaçlarla Scarus Sektöründe inşa edilen pek çok görkemli yapı, hâlâ ayakta duruyor. Hanedanlığınız çoktandır başka sektörlere odaklanmış olsa da, bu yapılar hanedanlığınızın anısını canlı tutuyor."
